content: Hello, I am discovering Fhir and yesterday I have open a new issue here https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/issues/2770 because I think that I have found a bug. I don't know if it is the right way or not. I write a message here, hoping that I will get help :). Thank you.

Hello Louis.
There is a stream here dedicated to #hapi. Perhaps you could describe the probable bug you found there, then the experts can answer you here.
Greetings
